title: Funny Forum Post
postdetail: This is a funny forum post... Look at it

title: Can we please do a movie night
postdetail: Please I am hoping we can do a movie night at one point in the near future. I beleive that this will be a cool event for our club to do. I do not know what movie we could do but please reply a suggestion and if you agree we should do a movie night.

replys.replyText: I agree movie night would be sick

Of all the movies the first on the list should be the Emoji Movie. It is a cinematic mastaer peice of film making not before seen. It is like Pixars Inside Out but with phones with how immersive and emotional it is. Where it lacks in some visual departments it more than makes up with it in its up to date humor and outstanding character design which puts it leagues most animated films made in the last 10 years! Which is why i suggest that if we do movie night that it is to watch Bee Movie, directors cut.
